00022 #ifndef _StandardDataPacket_h
00023 #define _StandardDataPacket_h
00024 #include "BasicDataPacket.h"
00025 
00026 namespace vrt {
00137   class StandardDataPacket : public BasicDataPacket {
00149     public: static const int64_t CLASS_ID_MASK  = __INT64_C(0xFFFFFFFF000000);
00151     public: static const int64_t CLASS_ID_CHECK = __INT64_C(0xFFFFFA00000000);
00152 
00154     public: ~StandardDataPacket () { }
00155 
00156     // TODO FIXME - add back constructor from old VRT to work with SinkVITA49
00157     // TODO FIXME - can SinkVITA49 be updated to use a different constructor?
00158     public: StandardDataPacket( const int32_t pktsize) : BasicDataPacket(pktsize) {}
00159     // End TODO FIXME
00160 
00162     public: StandardDataPacket (const BasicDataPacket &p) : BasicDataPacket(p) { }
00163 
00172     public: StandardDataPacket (const vector<char> &buf, bool readonly) : BasicDataPacket(buf,readonly) { }
00173 
00181     public: StandardDataPacket (DataType type=DataType_Int8, RealComplexType realComplex=RealComplexType_Real, int32_t frameSize=0) {
00182       setPayloadFormat(type, realComplex, frameSize);
00183     }
00184 
00189     public: StandardDataPacket (const PayloadFormat &format) {
00190       setPayloadFormat(format);
00191     }
00192 
00194     public: static bool isStandardDataPacket (int64_t id) {
00195       if (isNull(id)) return false;
00196       return ((id & CLASS_ID_MASK) == CLASS_ID_CHECK);
00197     }
00198 
00199     public: virtual string getPacketValid (bool strict, int32_t length) const;
00200 
00201     protected: virtual void toStringStream (ostringstream &str) const;
00202 
00203     public: virtual inline PayloadFormat getPayloadFormat () const {
00204       return toPayloadFormat(getClassIdentifier());
00205     }
00206 
00211     public: inline DataType getDataType () const {
00212       PayloadFormat pf = getPayloadFormat();
00213       return (isNull(pf))? (DataType)INT32_NULL : pf.getDataType();
00214     }
00215 
00220     public: inline RealComplexType getRealComplexType () const {
00221       PayloadFormat pf = getPayloadFormat();
00222       return (isNull(pf))? (RealComplexType)INT32_NULL : pf.getRealComplexType();
00223     }
00224 
00229     public: inline int32_t getFrameSize () const {
00230       PayloadFormat pf = getPayloadFormat();
00231       return (isNull(pf))? -1 : pf.getVectorSize();
00232     }
00233 
00234     public: virtual void setPayloadFormat (const PayloadFormat &pf);
00235 
00243     public: virtual void setPayloadFormat (DataType type, RealComplexType realComplex, int32_t frameSize);
00244 
00246     private: static PayloadFormat toPayloadFormat (int64_t classID);
00247 
00249     private: static int64_t toClassID (DataType type, RealComplexType realComplex, int32_t frameSize) {
00250       return toClassID(_toPayloadFormat(type, realComplex, frameSize));
00251     }
00252 
00254     private: static int64_t toClassID (const PayloadFormat &pf);
00255     
00257     private: static inline PayloadFormat _toPayloadFormat (DataType type, RealComplexType realComplex, int32_t frameSize) {
00258       PayloadFormat pf(type, realComplex);
00259       if (frameSize > 1) pf.setVectorSize(frameSize);
00260       return pf;
00261     }
00262   };
00263 } END_NAMESPACE
00264 #endif /* _StandardDataPacket_h */
